# Matthew Thaokhamlue - Senior Product Manager

> Matthew Thaokhamlue is a Senior Product Manager based in Berlin, Germany, with 7+ years of experience driving AI-powered innovation in health analytics, laboratory informatics, and B2B SaaS platforms. He specializes in AI/ML product development, API/SDK platforms, voice AI, and cross-functional team leadership.

## Key Information

- **Current Role**: Senior Product Manager at Labforward GmbH (Nov 2024 - Nov 2025)
- **Location**: Berlin, Germany
- **Specializations**: AI/ML Product Management, B2B SaaS, Health Analytics, Laboratory Informatics, Voice AI, API/SDK Platforms
- **Languages**: English (IELTS 7.5), German (B1), Thai (Native)
- **Education**: Master of International and Development Economics (HTW Berlin, DAAD Scholar), Bachelor's in Economics (Chiang Mai University)
